title: chestcommands插件无法使用物品打开
author: Booum
txt_content: 如题，可以用木牌[menu]打开，用指令cc open xxxxx 玩家 也可以。 权限也给了  求破{:10_505:}

replies.author: KK44KK
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
物品打开的权限给了没有?
-    chestcommands.item.filename.yml    同上,该权限是是否能通过设置物品来打开面板

replies.author: Booum
replies.txt_content:
KK44KK 发表于 2015-4-19 18:35
menu-settings:
  name: '&6&l快捷菜单'
  rows: 1
就是这么设置的啊


menu-settings:
  name: '森罗-SomoreCraft'
  rows: 6
  open-sound: NOTE_PLING
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 347
    left-click: false
    right-click: true
    data-value: 0

replies.author: KK44KK
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Booum
replies.txt_content:
KK44KK 发表于 2015-4-19 18:35
menu-settings:
  name: '&6&l快捷菜单'
  rows: 1
已解决。是版本问题，item改成了id就行了
